title: Online Microlearning-Based Faculty Development Program: Real-Time Application Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilization of microlearning modules for middle school social studies teachers to solve real-time educational problems encountered during work

learning_goals: Learners can establish concrete action plans for on-site problem-solving within three days using 5-minute microcontent units
Learners collaborate with PBL team members to apply teaching methods acquired from microlearning to actual lesson designs and receive peer evaluations
Learners can integrate and manage five or more micro-credentials earned through a digital badge system into their portfolios
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
